article_title: American Airlines Picks GE-Safran Engines for Airbus Planes
article_text:
American Airlines Group has selected a joint venture of General Electric Co. and Safran SA to power its new Airbus Group NV A320neo narrow-body planes.

The deal is valued at $2.6 billion at list price, the Franco-American engine joint venture said today in a statement. Buyers typically receive significant discounts. (See more updates from...
